definition: to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: A symposium on Camus is a lie.
sentences.chinese: 一场关于加缪的讨论会本身就是扯淡。

sentences.english: I attended seminars by companies trying to recruit teachers.
sentences.chinese: 我参加了想招聘老师的公司的讨论会。

sentences.english: She is guesting on a television panel show.
sentences.chinese: 她作为特邀客人参加电视讨论会。

sentences.english: Everybody engaged to talk in the afternoon's meeting.
sentences.chinese: 下午讨论会，大家依照论点，踊跃发言。

sentences.english: We'll be talking probably more than any other scholar about her work in this class.
sentences.chinese: 我们对她的讨论会比对其他人多。

sentences.english: I always enjoy going to sexuality conferences.
sentences.chinese: 我常常沉醉于有关性爱的讨论会。

sentences.english: What were the overall goals of the colloquium?
sentences.chinese: 学术讨论会的总体目标是什么？

sentences.english: Unfortunately, a full discussion would require several hundred more pages.
sentences.chinese: 不幸地，完全的讨论会需要一些百较多的页。

sentences.english: teacher-training workshop on curriculum evaluation and monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 关于课程评价和监测的教师培训讨论会。

sentences.english: Dr. Jameson became the centre of attraction at the seminar.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆森博士成为讨论会上引人注目的中心人物。

sentences.english: Managing the convention department administer the symposium, and inspect the series work tangible achievements of member.
sentences.chinese: 主持召开部门管理讨论会，稽查组员的工作实绩。

sentences.english: What is the International Human Rights Colloquium?
sentences.chinese: 什么是国际人权讨论会？

sentences.english: They had us attend conferences and panels, as well as tour development studios.
sentences.chinese: 学校让我们参加会议和讨论会，参观开发制作室。

sentences.english: These young men juiced up the conference with their new ideas.
sentences.chinese: 这些年轻人以他们的新思想使讨论会变得生动活泼。

sentences.english: The discussion sessions allow people to open the floodgates to their deepest fears.
sentences.chinese: 这些讨论会使人们尽情倾诉心中的恐惧。

sentences.english: Engage with world-renowned clinical experts at specialty workshops and thought leader sessions.
sentences.chinese: 与目前最著名的临床专家在论题讨论会上面对面交流。

definition: to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
